name: @twop/quickjs-emscripten
description: this is esmodule version for the web of https://github.com/justjake/quickjs-emscripten published as es2020 js spec.

scripts.prepare: yarn prepack && mocha ./dist/quickjs.test.js && yarn tarball && yarn smoketest-node
scripts.prepack: yarn make-release && yarn build && cp ./ts/quickjs-emscripten-module.wasm dist
scripts.smoketest-node: cd examples/typescript-smoketest && YARN_CHECKSUM_BEHAVIOR=update yarn add quickjs-emscripten@../../build/quickjs-emscripten.tgz && tsc --lib ES2015,dom index.ts && node index.js
scripts.smoketest-cra: cd examples/website && YARN_CHECKSUM_BEHAVIOR=update yarn add quickjs-emscripten@../../build/quickjs-emscripten.tgz && yarn build
